# Vendors Folder

Place **pre-built, production-ready** vendor files (CSS, JS libraries, fonts) here.

These files are copied **as-is** to your distribution folder during the build process.

## Example Structure

```
vendors/
├─ bootstrap/
│   ├─ bootstrap.min.css
│   └─ bootstrap.bundle.min.js
└─ bootstrap-icons/
    ├─ bootstrap-icons.css
    └─ fonts/
        └─ bootstrap-icons.woff2
```

## Usage

See the main [README.md](../README.md#managing-vendor-files-bootstrap-jquery-etc) for complete documentation on managing vendor files.
